LanguageData.LF_Turret_PrecisionMortar.label: precision mortar
LanguageData.LF_Turret_PrecisionMortar.description: This mortar has an extremely narrow spread, granting it higher accuracy then other mortars.\nBallistic correction is performed in real time using information obtained through hacked monitoring satellites and radiosondes. A radiosonde is a telemetry instrument that floats in the atmosphere-often via weather balloon-and measures various atmospheric parameters, like air pressure, temperature, humidity, and wind.\n(zone of dispersion : radius 3)
